description: Explore the Trump administration's influence on open source policy, examining how policies in cybersecurity, federal IT infrastructure, and the private sector navigated the intersection of innovation and regulation. Understand the continuity, subtle influences, and the ongoing significance of open source solutions in modern IT ecosystems during his tenure.
keywords: Trump administration, open source policy, technology, cybersecurity, federal IT infrastructure, innovation, regulation, private sector, IT modernization, deregulation
title: The Trump Administration and Open Source Policy: Navigating the Intersection of Innovation and Regulation
